reviews.text: The food was really good with organic ingredients and fresh veggies. The service was good too!
Calamari tough and chewy, spring mix laced with pieces that have turned, garlic shrimp over salted and shrimp mushy. Cucumber salad was ok.
Server was very nice but the food was certainly overpriced for its quality.. Pretty salty and also $10 for an appetizer of spring rolls seemed pretty outrageous..

Went here for a holiday party. The staff was great, lots of patience and super kind. The only thing that I liked from their food though was the steak, everything else tasted like they lost either spice rack.. totally bland..

Tiger rolls. This is the only place that has them anywhere and they are heavenly. Awesome outdoor seating overlooking the creek. Prices are higher than they should be but they cater to the tourist clientele/one time dinner guest. Very busy venue. Reservations recommended.
